51#ifndef AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_H
52#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_H
55#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_SBL 0xA3
56#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_AM3P 0x3A
57#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_PATCH 0xAF
58#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_MAIN 0xC0
59#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_CHILD 0xCC
60#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_NONSECURE 0xCB
61#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_INFO0 0xCF
62
64typedef struct
65{
66 union
67 {
68 uint32_t ui32;
69 struct
70 {
71 uint32_t blobSize : 20;
72 uint32_t resvd : 3;
73 uint32_t encrypted : 1;
74 uint32_t magicNum : 8;
75 } s;
76 } w0;
77 uint32_t crc;
78 union
79 {
80 uint32_t ui32;
81 struct
82 {
83 uint32_t authAlgo : 4;
84 uint32_t authKeyIdx : 4;
85 uint32_t encAlgo : 4;
86 uint32_t keyIdx : 4;
87 uint32_t resvd3 : 8;
88 uint32_t crcBoot : 1;
89 uint32_t authBoot : 1;
90 uint32_t resvd2 : 2;
91 uint32_t crcInstall : 1;
92 uint32_t authInstall : 1;
93 uint32_t resvd1 : 2;
94 } s;
95 } w2;
96 uint32_t w3;
97 uint32_t signature[8]; // w4-11
98 uint32_t iv[4]; // w12-w15
99 uint32_t kek[4]; // w16-w19
100 uint32_t signatureClear[8]; // w20-w27
101 union
102 {
103 uint32_t ui32;
104 struct
105 {
106 uint32_t offsetWords : 16;
107 uint32_t sizeWords : 16;
108 } info0;
109 struct
110 {
111 uint32_t encap : 1;
112 uint32_t resvd : 1;
113 uint32_t loadAddrMsb : 30;
114 } s1;
115 struct
116 {
117 uint32_t writeProtect : 1;
118 uint32_t copyProtect : 1;
119 uint32_t loadAddrMsb : 30;
120 } s;
121 } addrWord; // w28
122 union
123 {
124 uint32_t ui32;
125 uint32_t resv;
126 uint32_t key; // For info
127 struct
128 {
129 uint32_t version : 15;
130 uint32_t erasePrev : 1;
131 uint32_t resv : 16;
132 } s;
133 } versionKeyWord; // w29
134} am_image_hdr_common_t;
135
137#define AM_IMAGE_BITMASK_ENCRYPTED 0x00800000
139#define AM_IMAGE_LOAD_ADDR_MSB_BITS 30
140
141#define AM_IMAGE_GET_LOADADDR(common) (((am_image_hdr_common_t *)(common))->addrWord.s.loadAddrMsb << (32 - AM_IMAGE_LOAD_ADDR_MSB_BITS))
142
143#define AM_IMAGE_NUM_TRAILING_WORDS_TO_256 ((256 - sizeof(am_image_hdr_common_t))/4)
144#define AM_IMAGE_MAX_CHILD_IMAGE AM_IMAGE_NUM_TRAILING_WORDS_TO_256
145
146typedef struct
147{
148 am_image_hdr_common_t common;
149 uint32_t childPtr[AM_IMAGE_MAX_CHILD_IMAGE];
150} am_main_image_hdr_t;
151
152typedef struct
153{
154 am_image_hdr_common_t common;
155 uint32_t featureKey;
156 uint32_t resvd[1];
157} am_thirdparty_image_hdr_t;
158
159typedef struct
160{
161 am_image_hdr_common_t common;
162 uint32_t resvd[AM_IMAGE_NUM_TRAILING_WORDS_TO_256];
163} am_sbl_image_hdr_t;
164
166#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_CUST(x) ((((x) & 0xF0) == 0xC0) && ((x) != 0xC0) && ((x) != 0xCC) && ((x) != 0xCB) && ((x) != 0xCF))
167
169
171#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_MAX_OTA 8
172
185#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_VALID_MASK 0x3
186#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_GET_BLOB_PTR(ptr) ((uint32_t)(ptr) & ~AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_VALID_MASK)
187#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_IS_VALID(ptr) (((uint32_t)(ptr) & AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_VALID_MASK) == AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_VALID_MASK)
188#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_LIST_END_MARKER 0xFFFFFFFF
189
191#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_DONE_FAILURE_CLRMASK 0x1
192#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_DONE_SUCCESS_CLRMASK 0x3
193
194
196typedef enum
197{
198 AM_HAL_OTA_STATUS_SUCCESS = 0x0,
199 AM_HAL_OTA_STATUS_ERROR = 0x1, // This should never happen
200 AM_HAL_OTA_STATUS_FAILURE = 0x2,
201 AM_HAL_OTA_STATUS_PENDING = 0x3,
202} am_hal_ota_status_e;
203
205typedef struct
206{
207 uint32_t *pImage;
208 am_hal_ota_status_e status;
209} am_hal_ota_status_t;
210
